trans-unit.source: Indicates how to play sounds when calling audio methods.
trans-unit.target: Indica come riprodurre i suoni quando vengono chiamati i metodi audio.

trans-unit.source: You can use the `AudioPlayMode` enumeration members to control how the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Play%2A> method plays sounds.
trans-unit.target: Ãˆ possibile utilizzare il `AudioPlayMode` membri di enumerazione per controllare il modo in <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Play%2A> method riproduce il suono.

trans-unit.source: Causes the <see langword="My.Computer.Audio.Play" /> method to play the sound in the background.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see langword="My.Computer.Audio.Play" /> riproduce l'audio in background.

trans-unit.source: The calling code continues to execute.
trans-unit.target: Il codice chiamante continua a essere eseguito.

trans-unit.source: Causes the <see langword="My.Computer.Audio.Play" /> method to play the sound in the background until the <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Stop" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see langword="My.Computer.Audio.Play" /> riproduce l'audio in background fino a quando non viene chiamato il metodo <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Audio.Stop" />.

trans-unit.source: The calling code continues to execute.
trans-unit.target: Il codice chiamante continua a essere eseguito.

trans-unit.source: Causes the <see langword="My.Computer.Audio.Play" /> method to play the sound, and waits until it completes before calling code continues.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see langword="My.Computer.Audio.Play" /> riproduce l'audio e al termine riprende l'esecuzione del codice chiamante.
